ns2:test-suite.name: Register and login to My Store
ns2:test-suite.title: Register and login to My Store

test-case.name: Login to Test Store and place order for a product
test-case.title: Login to Test Store and place order for a product

label.name: feature
label.value: Register and login to My Store

step.name: Given I am on the login page
step.title: Given I am on the login page

step.name: When I click on Login or Register link
step.title: When I click on Login or Register link

step.name: And I enter loginId "wdiotest03" and password "Pass123"
step.title: And I enter loginId "wdiotest03" and password "Pass123"

step.name: And I click on Login button
step.title: And I click on Login button

step.name: Then I should see welcome back "WDIO" message
step.title: Then I should see welcome back "WDIO" message

step.name: When I hover over product menu "Apparel & accessories"
step.title: When I hover over product menu "Apparel & accessories"

step.name: When I click on product "Casual 3/4 Sleeve Baseball T-Shirt"
step.title: When I click on product "Casual 3/4 Sleeve Baseball T-Shirt"

step.name: And I click on Add to Cart button
step.title: And I click on Add to Cart button

step.name: And I click on checkout button
step.title: And I click on checkout button

step.name: Then I should see the product name as "Casual 3/4 Sleeve Baseball T-Shirt"
step.title: Then I should see the product name as "Casual 3/4 Sleeve Baseball T-Shirt"

step.name: When I click on Confirm Order
step.title: When I click on Confirm Order

step.name: Then I should see order confirmation message
step.title: Then I should see order confirmation message
